mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_report ( user_id, status, revolving_utilization_of_unsecured_lines, age, number_of_time_30_to_59_days_past_due_not_worse, debt_ratio, monthly_income, number_of_open_credit_lines_and_loans, number_of_times_90_days_late, number_real_estate_loans_or_lines, number_of_time_60_to_89_days_past_due_not_worse, number_of_dependents, create_time, expire_time ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{status}, #{revolvingUtilizationOfUnsecuredLines}, #{age}, #{numberOfTime30To59DaysPastDueNotWorse}, #{debtRatio}, #{monthlyIncome}, #{numberOfOpenCreditLinesAndLoans}, #{numberOfTimes90DaysLate}, #{numberRealEstateLoansOrLines}, #{numberOfTime60To89DaysPastDueNotWorse}, #{numberOfDependents}, #{createTime}, #{expireTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id as userId, status, revolving_utilization_of_unsecured_lines as revolvingUtilizationOfUnsecuredLines, age, number_of_time_30_to_59_days_past_due_not_worse as numberOfTime30To59DaysPastDueNotWorse, debt_ratio as debtRatio, monthly_income as monthlyIncome, number_of_open_credit_lines_and_loans as numberOfOpenCreditLinesAndLoans, number_of_times_90_days_late as numberOfTimes90DaysLate, number_real_estate_loans_or_lines as numberRealEstateLoansOrLines, number_of_time_60_to_89_days_past_due_not_worse as numberOfTime60To89DaysPastDueNotWorse, number_of_dependents as numberOfDependents, create_time as createTime, expire_time as expireTime FROM user_report WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, user_id as userId, status, revolving_utilization_of_unsecured_lines as revolvingUtilizationOfUnsecuredLines, age, number_of_time_30_to_59_days_past_due_not_worse as numberOfTime30To59DaysPastDueNotWorse, debt_ratio as debtRatio, monthly_income as monthlyIncome, number_of_open_credit_lines_and_loans as numberOfOpenCreditLinesAndLoans, number_of_times_90_days_late as numberOfTimes90DaysLate, number_real_estate_loans_or_lines as numberRealEstateLoansOrLines, number_of_time_60_to_89_days_past_due_not_worse as numberOfTime60To89DaysPastDueNotWorse, number_of_dependents as numberOfDependents, create_time as createTime, expire_time as expireTime FROM user_report WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT id, user_id as userId, status, revolving_utilization_of_unsecured_lines as revolvingUtilizationOfUnsecuredLines, age, number_of_time_30_to_59_days_past_due_not_worse as numberOfTime30To59DaysPastDueNotWorse, debt_ratio as debtRatio, monthly_income as monthlyIncome, number_of_open_credit_lines_and_loans as numberOfOpenCreditLinesAndLoans, number_of_times_90_days_late as numberOfTimes90DaysLate, number_real_estate_loans_or_lines as numberRealEstateLoansOrLines, number_of_time_60_to_89_days_past_due_not_worse as numberOfTime60To89DaysPastDueNotWorse, number_of_dependents as numberOfDependents, create_time as createTime, expire_time as expireTime FROM user_report WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
